text: There's light in the practice room...

One, two, three, four
One, two, three...──
Good work, Koito. Are you practicing on your own?

Ah, um...
I've already... informed that I'll be late getting home.

I see.
Then there's no need to worry.

...But still, practicing on your own until
this late, is there something going on?

Koito-chan, let's keep pushing a bit more!
You're the only one off on the steps.

Um, well... There are some parts I can't do well
even though I've been practicing them over and over...
I-I've practiced it so many times, but...

...I see. So that's why you've been
working so hard by yourself until this late.

No, there's no need to apologize.
I'm rather impressed, to be honest.
But, try not to push yourself too hard.

Today, I want to...
grasp the feeling... within me...

S-So...
I'll keep going a bit more...!

But let's take a short break before continuing.
You've been practicing without rest this whole time, right?

I'll go get some drinks.
Is a sports drink okay?
"Can I keep pushing a bit more?" huh...

...Make sure you don't push yourself too hard.
I'll keep an eye on you...

One, two, three, four
One, two, three...──
Yeah, that last one was good, wasn't it?

But just a bit more...
I feel like I'm about to grasp it...!

Alright, keep it up!
Let's stay focused!
